action.name: Execute
action.execute: rxvt-unicode -e bash -i -c "while read -r -t 0;do read -r; done;IFS= read -n 1 -p 'Press [Enter] to hibernate or [Space] to abort... ' TRYAGAIN;if [[ ${TRYAGAIN} == ' ' ]];then echo '';echo 'Aborting hibernate!!!';sleep 5;else echo 'Hibernating...';sudo pm-hibernate;sleep 15;fi;"

context.name: Titlebar Top Right Bottom Left TLCorner TRCorner BRCorner BLCorner
